body:
To use the shop commands you have to be in a shop.

list            - List items the vendor has for sale.
list <search>   - View details of an item for sale, e.g., 'list 2.sword{x'
buy <item>      - Purchase an item for sale.
appraise <item> - Ask the vendor how much an item is worth.
sell <item>     - Sell an item.
